events.text: Morpheus, so good of you to join me.
Melas. Of the Oneiros you are the least pleasant company. What has this dreamer done to win your ire?
She's just helping me carry a message. For I'm sure the same reason you've come.
This one's dreams are under my protection. Leave before I must make this unpleasant for you.
What little good it has done her so far! Now come, Morpheus. Let's play..
